name: Regale 2
description: Regale is a mosaic grid theme designed for photostreams, collections and blogging. Regale's image grid is fluid and adapts itself to fit every screen size. Also includes super-sized content pages for individual photos and full screen splash slideshow pages for featured content and albums.

splash.name: Splash (featured content)
splash.description: Displays a full screen slideshow of your featured content

splash_fa.name: Splash (featured albums)
splash_fa.description: Displays a full screen slideshow of your featured albums
